Package com.heslington_hustle.game

Class Activity

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.heslington_hustle.game.Activity
  • public class Activity
extends java.lang.Object
    The Activity class represents an activity that can be performed by the player. Each activity has attributes such as energy required, time duration, type, description, and a zone where the activity can be performed.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  Activity.ActivityType
      Type of the activity.
